PerfectNetExp.abs: 双子叶植物纲金缕梅亚纲（hamamelidae）（Hamamelidae）的1科。木本。

means.word_mean: 1. a group of chiefly woody plants considered among the most primitive of angiosperms; perianth poorly developed or lacking; flowers often unisexual and often in catkins and often wind pollinated; contains 23 families including the Betulaceae and Fagaceae
